price: O kəslər ki, qeybə iman gətirir, namaz qılır və Bizim onlara verdiyimiz ruzidən (Allah yolunda) xərcləyirlər;
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
